issues.description: Inconsistent capitalization of the same table name 'Gemeinde' across artifacts: the problem statement and most solution files use 'Gemeinde' (capital G), but solution_repository/aufgabe04.sql uses 'gemeinde' (lowercase). This inconsistency can create unnecessary confusion or runtime errors for students (depending on the SQL dialect/collation) and increases extraneous cognitive load when mapping the problem description to the provided/expected SQL code.
issues.suggested_fix: Standardize the table identifier across all artifacts. Rename 'gemeinde' to 'Gemeinde' in solution_repository/aufgabe04.sql (change FROM gemeinde to FROM Gemeinde). Ensure templates and all solution files use the same capitalization for table names to avoid student confusion and potential SQL errors.
